name: goodybag-cli
description: The goodybag kickass command line interface.

help.help: Prints the basic usage information on each [COMMAND] given (1 or more). Otherwise, prints the full table of available commands.

version.help: Prints out the current version of goodybag-cli.

start.help: Starts the server from scratch if no flags are given. This means starting Postgres, redis, mongod, grunt, and finally the goodybag-cater server, in that order. If flags are given, then only the programs specified will start. If a program is already started, it will be ignored.

restart.description: Restarts the server, if it is running.
